20/* Id */
21
22#ifndef ISC_LIB_H
23#define ISC_LIB_H 1
24
25/*! \file isc/lib.h */
26
27#include <isc/types.h>
28#include <isc/lang.h>
29
30ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
31
32LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern isc_msgcat_t *isc_msgcat;
33
34void
35isc_lib_initmsgcat(void);
36/*!<
37 * \brief Initialize the ISC library's message catalog, isc_msgcat, if it
38 * has not already been initialized.
39 */
40
41void
42isc_lib_register(void);
43/*!<
44 * \brief Register the ISC library implementations for some base services
45 * such as memory or event management and handling socket or timer events.
46 * An external application that wants to use the ISC library must call this
47 * function very early in main().
48 */
49
50ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
51
52#endif /* ISC_LIB_H */
53
